author: jalkanen
msg: Agh!  Now escapes properly the errors caught when you get some non -DOM content.

author: arj
msg: Changed default tests/etc/groupdatabase.xml and tests/etc/userdatabase.xml so that they use the platform-independent date formats for creation/modification datestamps. Also, fixed a bug in XMLUserDatabase that caused "old" date formats to not be converted on startup. Thanks to Harry Metske for reporting this issue.

author: arj
msg: Changed default tests/etc/groupdatabase.xml and tests/etc/userdatabase.xml so that they use the platform-independent date formats for creation/modification datestamps. Also, fixed a bug in XMLUserDatabase that caused "old" date formats to not be converted on startup. Thanks to Harry Metske for reporting this issue.
